name: tauri-app
browserslist: fully supports serviceworkers and fully supports broadcastchannel

scripts.predev: pnpm --filter ./frame-glue run build && pnpm --filter ./subdomain run build
scripts.dev: pnpm predev && (pnpm --filter ./subdomain run preview & vite dev --host)
scripts.prebuild: pnpm --filter ./frame-glue run build && pnpm --filter ./subdomain run build
